alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Baltimore City; Harford (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 7:31PM EDT until July 03 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Baltimore City in northern Maryland... Western Harford County in northern Maryland... Northeastern Baltimore County in northern Maryland... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 731 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jarrettsville to Hampton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Middle River, Cockeysville, Towson, Bel Air South, Parkville, Bel Air North, Carney, Perry Hall, Rosedale, Rossville, Timonium, White Marsh, Fallston, Bowleys Quarters, Hampton, Kingsville, Pleasant Hills, Jarrettsville and Lutherville-Timonium. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
